review: Kenalog-40 (triamcinolone):I have not got a solution yet, it is itching so much and is growing too, please I need help and solution to it

Kenalog-40 (triamcinolone):It worked for me for the moment. I got injected for over a year and the keloids got red and came back bigger. I got a big one on my chest and 3 on my back.  And now when I get a pimple or a small scratch they turned to keloids after years later with no injections . I guess since it's in my body the scars turned red and now getting bigger and these 2 new ones were ,Never injected.  It sucks I'm 36 and they don't stop growing.

Kenalog-40 (triamcinolone):I have been suffering with Keloids all of my life. I have recently started going to a dermatologist for Kenalog-40 injections monthly. I have seen a big difference. I works real well.
